io.wcm.handler.media.format

Class MediaFormatBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.handler.media.format.MediaFormatBuilder

  • @ProviderType
public final class MediaFormatBuilder
extends Object
    Fluent API for building media format definitions.
